title: Accessibility problems with tab key in Help view
description: When using the application, I observed an accessibility issue where the tab key does not respond as expected. Specifically, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas, such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame, before it starts working.
OB: On March 26, 2002, on a Windows 2000 machine, when I launch the Help view, the tab key does not function as intended.
EB: Upon launching the Help view, the tab key should navigate through the interactive elements without requiring an initial click on specific areas.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch the application on a Windows 2000 machine.
2. Navigate to the Help view.
3. Attempt to use the tab key to navigate through the interface.
Expected result: The tab key should function without the need for an initial click on specific areas.
